topics.body:
Hey out of curiosity, does anyone here watch Oh My Goddess? I'd love to do a fanfic on something like that with MLP, just with having Celestia and co being goddesses residing over humanity, and so forth. It'd be a fun crossover, and a bit of ecchi, and mostly just romance. 

Though I have no idea who the main male character should be, aside from Spike, or a Male OC. And no way in hell am I putting in Flash Sentry.
